ygData.subject: Re: Sparks
ygData.msgSnippet: As he tinkered with the receptors words began to form. Matrix , name, and most dominantly Lunarpine. Shadow Wing was truly a remarkable piece of work.

As he tinkered with the receptors words began to 
form. "Matrix", "name," and most dominantly "Lunarpine." Shadow Wing 
was truly a remarkable piece of work. Veratis was getting the chance 
that most science bots only dreamed of. He was monitoring a protoform 
merging with a spark.

"I wonder what would happen if I... Yes that WILL work." he thought 
as he removed another set of equipment from it's case. he hooked up 
to himself, hopefully causing a link between the subject and himself. 
The words were clearer now that he was directly linked. 

He repeated his last message "Shadow Wing, can you understand me?"

  -- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She heard a strange voice. It was faint, and she could barely 
> understand it. She jumped and was so happy just to know that there 
> was another presence there. Then she suddenly realized that is knew 
> her name. She felt frightened. "Who are you? Are you the Matrix? 
HAve 
> I died and found my way to the Matrix? How did you know my name? 
> Where's Lunarpine? What's going on?"  Her thought went onto a 
million 
> directions at once and felt fearfull that she would never see 
> Lunarpine again.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > Veratis watched the spikes increase it was definately stable, and 
> > very much alive. he tried to understand it, adjusting the 
receptors 
> > as he worked. he stepped around to his main console. "Shadow Wing 
I 
> > presume? Can you understand me?" He couldn't quite understand 
what 
> he 
> > was hearing but there was always the chance that the protoform 
> could 
> > still hear.
> >
